title: How to Make Crispy Vegetable Spring Rolls

steps.headline: Cook the vegetables.
steps.description: Heat the wok with some vegetable oil. Add in the carrots, red pepper, bamboo shoots, bean sprouts, and cabbage. Cook everything together until they have slightly softened.

steps.headline: Add the wet ingredients.
steps.description: Add the noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, salt, and pepper. Mix well and remove from the heat. Place everything in a bowl to cool.

steps.headline: Make the spring rolls.
steps.description: Place the spring roll wrapper in front of you, with one corner at the bottom so that it resembles a diamond. Brush the four edges of the wrapper with the beaten egg. Next, add the filling in the bottom part of the wrapper in a thin log shape, not touching the edges. Leave the bottom few centimetres clear.

steps.headline: Lift the wrapper over the top and tuck it in under the filling.
steps.description: Fold over the left side, and then the right side and roll it up to form a tube. Brush a little more egg along the top part and seal the roll.

steps.headline: Repeat until all the rolls are finished.
Fry the egg rolls.
steps.description: Place a pan with oil over a medium heat. Wait until the oil is hot and then deep fry the egg rolls until they are lightly brown. Drain them on paper towels.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Serve the finished egg rolls with a side of sweet & sour sauce or other favorite dips.
